title: WTB - T206 HOF have $600 to spend
author: Panatha

posts.post_title: WTB - T206 HOF have $600 to spend
posts.post_content: I'm looking to pick up some HOF cards and have a budget of $600. Decent shape cards (no major creases and ripped backs). The more cards the better (not looking for one $600 card). Let me know what you have. Thanks.
I have $300 to spend on a HOF card(s). Prefer to get 2 cards for that amount. Let me know what you got.
